text: Ā (tīrpu) dinamuna kondari mukhālu (santōṣantō) prakāśistū uṇṭāyi. Marikondari mukhālu (duḥkhantō) nallabaḍi uṇṭāyi. Ika evari mukhālu nallabaḍi uṇṭāyō vāritō: "Mīru viśvasin̄cina taruvāta satyatiraskārulu ayyāru kadā? Kābaṭṭi mīru satyānni tiraskarin̄cinanduku ī śikṣanu anubhavin̄caṇḍi." (Ani anabaḍutundi)
